title: JSW Energy names Sharad Mahendra as next Joint MD & CEO
description: JSW Energy has announced Sharad Mahendra as the new Joint Managing Director and CEO, succeeding Prashant Jain. Mahendra, the CEO designate, will assume office on February 1, 2024, after Jain steps down on January 31. Prashant Jain had earlier announced his decision to step down from the position to pursue personal interests.
